description.p: Create presentations that stand out! Spice-Up has everything you need to create simple and beautiful presentations. Get your ideas across with beautiful designed templates, or start from scratch with a blank canvas. Either way, you will add some spice to your presentations with a wide variety of background patterns and a beautiful color palette.

ul.li: Export to PDF!
Presentation Browser: Scroll through the presentations you have made and jump right into them with one click!
Controller Support: If you have a USB or Bluetooth controller, plug it in and control your slides!
Share your Spice-Up files and open them from a web browser if the app is not installed, no extra software needed!
Open and edit images in your favorite editor, and it will automatically update when saved.
Templates, a touch of creativity is all you need to make presentations in a blink of an eye.
Bring your presentation to life with slide show transitions.
Present like a pro with slide-by-slide notes only viewable by you!
Spice-Up now respects privacy settings. When enabled, it will not show recently opened presentations.
The external templates fetcher service has been removed.
French translation updated by NathanBnm
German translation added by herrhotzenplotz
A big thanks to all the translators for your work!
Spice-Up will now prevent your computer from suspending and hide your cursor while presenting!
You can now open more than one file at the time! Makes copy-pasting slides or images between presentations easier
Spice-Up now uses the new tooltips to show the keyboard shortcuts!
There are also now keyboard shortcuts for a lot of actions such as Bring Forward and adding a new slide
Opening the presenter notes now automatically focuses it for faster note-taking
Fixed a small visual bug when returning to the editor while on the last slide
Exporting a presentation will now always have the .pdf extension
The Clipboard is now super smart!
You can now paste text and images into Spice-Up for external apps!
And you can also copy text and images to apps outside of Spice-Up
Pasting a slide to another app with paste it as an image. Sharing your work is even easier now!
Fixed shadows on the Slide Previews not showing up, making the slide appear flat.
Fixed problem with canvas showing items moved a bit when resizing.

description.p: Slide Transitions and the Slide List Redesign

ul.li: After so long, Slide Transitions are finally here! Use them to make your presentations more interesting
The New Slide Button will now always appear at the bottom, and new slides will now be added after the currently selected slide
You can right click the slide, and select from the actions there.
From that right click menu, you can now select which slide will be shown in the thumbnail!
Presenter notes has been moved to the main window. Toggle the editor from the new button on the headerbar!
Some color and Style changes!
Fixed the problem where empty slides would refuse to render on the Slide List!
Fixed: Non-editable items on the toolbar now show up properly
Spice-Up is now ready for elementary OS Juno!
Even more colors and gradients for you to make your presentations even better!
Files and Templates now show a label with it's name on the welcome screen
You can now copy and paste styles on the color pickers!
New templates will now be fetched from the web, so expect more to come!
New translations for Japanese, Catalan, Portuguese, Dutch!
The new color picker now uses their own custom icons!
The Gradient Editor's steps now shows feedback when selected
Spice-Up's icon has being updated to use the elementary color palette.
European Portuguese has been added to the family of translations. Big thanks to emansije!
The color picker has had a mayor makeover!
You can now add/remove stops in gradients, as well as move them around and rotate them.
Grab inspiration from one of the ten new gradient presets!
You can also pick colors from the screen.
Fonts are searchable now
Font-styles are now styled (pun intended)
Notifications are now disabled when presenting
Presentation View! Starting a presentation with two monitors will open the presentation on the secondary monitor, and a presentation viewer on your main screen.
You can now type presenter notes, and see them while presenting!
Your presentations now end with an all-black slide
Images can now be added by Drag and Drop
Spice-Up is now available in Serbian!
Some other fixes and cleanups
Presentations saved can now be viewed from a web browser by drag and drop if Spice-Up is not installed, and even if you're not using elementary OS or Linux
Lots of optimizations have happened, now it loads presentations crazy fast!
The Text Toolbar has been cleaned up to better match the other bars
You can now align text vertically!
Going to and from the Welcome Screen is now animated
Spice-Up is now translated to French and Portuguese!
Creating a new presentation now brings up templates you can choose from.
You can now replace images right from Spice-Up.
Making a new slide now picks up the style from your last one.
You can now make Text and Shapes transparent, right from the custom color picker!
Fixed: Double clicking would sometimes deselect the item.
Fixed: The text on the roundness slider was hard to read.
Spice-Up is also now available in Spanish!
Selecting slides, and colors on the color picker now feels like you actually press something.
ColorPicker: Click on the preview to be able to set both colors at once.
A better high resolution icon
Fixed: Spice-Up should now work a lot better with other themes
Fixed: Sometimes, the default blue color would get selected
Shapes: You can now set the roundness of the square, and finally make circles!
Cut, copy, and paste slides, and canvas items!
The presentations you make will appear on the welcome screen for easy access to them!
